name: TranSMART 17.1 - REST API V2 - Demo
description: Testing scripts used by The Hyve to verify the 17.1 project API calls

folders.name: B - Clinical trial / Relative time series
C - Arvados file linking and workflows

requests.name: query high dimensional observations linked to modifier
requests.description: Return all high dimensional observations linked to a certain modifier, sample type in this case

requests.name: query for the average value
requests.description: Returns the average value for a concept

requests.name: query observations for cross-study concept code
requests.description: Return all observations

requests.name: List Arvados container_requests

requests.url: {{url}}/v2/observations?biomarker_constraint={type: biomarker, biomarkerType: "genes", params: {names: ['TP53']}}&projection=zscore&constraint={type: concept, path: "\\Public Studies\\CLINICAL_TRIAL_HIGHDIM\\High Dimensional data\\Expression Lung\\"}&type=autodetect
requests.name: query high dimensional observations for a concept and gene
requests.description: Return all high dimensional observations for a concept, filtered by gene symbol TP53, linked to gene id 7157 (in this case synthetically linked to probes 1007_s_at and 117_at)

requests.name: query tree nodes for study node
requests.description: Return tree nodes

requests.name: query for a combination of patient and concept constraint
requests.description: Return all observations for a specified patient and concept

requests.url: {{url}}/v2/observations?constraint={ "type": "or", "args": [ { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\A\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\B\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\C\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\D\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\E\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\F\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\G\\" }, { "type": "concept", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\H\\" } ] }&type=clinical
requests.name: NO ACCESS - query categorical observations for big study
requests.description: Return all observations for a specified concept

requests.description: Return all RNA-Seq transcript data for a concept

requests.description: Returning tranSMART patient IDs based on study based patients IDs.

query RNA-Seq transcript on gene
requests.description: Return all RNA-Seq transcript data for a concept

requests.name: Update storage system
Register new workflow supported by transmart
List specific workflow supported by transmart
get token as user (and store)
requests.description: Using the glowingbear credentials we get an Oauth token to allow this REST client to use our credentials to access the tranSMART database.

responseCode.name: OK
responseCode.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.

headers.name: Cache-Control
headers.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

headers.name: Connection
headers.description: Options that are desired for the connection

headers.name: Content-Encoding
headers.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The mime type of this content

headers.name: Date
headers.description: The date and time that the message was sent

headers.name: Pragma
headers.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

headers.name: Transfer-Encoding
headers.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

headers.name: Vary
headers.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

headers.name: Via
headers.description: Informs the client of proxies through which the response was sent.
